title: Redesign Page 3 into a production-ready layout (match Page 2 quality)

requirements.summary: Replace the /page-3 placeholder with a full, production-ready multi-section layout (hero, grid/cards, detailed content, CTA) consistent with Page 2.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting `/page-3` no longer shows the current placeholder content (e.g., remove the generic placeholder paragraphs).
Page 3 contains at least: (1) a hero section with headline + supporting text, (2) a multi-card/grid section, (3) a detailed content section (bullets/steps), and (4) a final CTA section.
All sections are responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop) and use existing Tailwind + shadcn/ui components consistently.

file_operations.description: Redesign the page to mirror Page 2’s structure: build a hero section, a multi-card/grid section, a detailed bullets/steps section (e.g., “How PB Partners Hub helps partners”), and a closing CTA section. Compose the layout using existing Tailwind design tokens and shadcn/ui components (e.g., Card) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update Page 3 SEO metadata with meaningful English title/description aligned to PB Partners Hub content while keeping canonical /page-3.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/Page3Page.tsx` uses an updated `<SEO>` title and description (English) that are not generic (avoid “Page 3” / placeholder-style descriptions).

file_operations.description: Update the <SEO> props to a non-generic English title/description aligned with the new Page 3 content and PB Partners Hub positioning; keep canonical set to `/page-3`.

requirements.summary: Add prominent Page 3 navigation CTAs linking to existing flows (/partner-onboarding and /contact) using the same Link/Button patterns as Page 2.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 includes at least two prominent CTA buttons/links that navigate to `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`.
CTAs use TanStack Router `<Link>` and shadcn `<Button>` styling consistent with other pages (e.g., Page 2).

file_operations.description: Add CTA blocks (at least in the hero and final CTA sections) that use TanStack Router <Link> to route to `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`, styled with shadcn/ui <Button> variants consistent with Page 2. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure Page 3 uses a coherent theme consistent with the existing site (typography, spacing, backgrounds) without global theme changes.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 uses consistent typography scale (headings, body), spacing, and section backgrounds (e.g., subtle gradients or muted section backgrounds similar to Page 2).
No new global theme changes are required; styling stays within the existing Tailwind/theme variables.

file_operations.description: Apply Page 2-aligned section styling (e.g., gradient hero background, muted background for a mid-page section, consistent container widths, spacing, and heading scales) using existing Tailwind theme variables/classes only; avoid any global theme edits.
